content:
The provided chunk contains essential import statements necessary for initializing a 3D application using Panda3D. These imports are fundamental for creating the base application structure (`ShowBase`), handling user events and interactions (`DirectObject`), managing collision detection systems, and utilizing animation intervals to create visual effects upon collisions.

from direct.showbase.ShowBase import ShowBase
from direct.showbase.DirectObject import DirectObject
from direct.interval.IntervalGlobal import Sequence, Func, Wait
from panda3d.core import CollisionTraverser, CollisionHandlerEvent
from panda3d.core import CollisionNode, CollisionSphere
